section1_desc1: Bringing a new Fintech brand to life.
section2_desc1: They delivered a quality design for the landing website. Team was very much responsive even when there was critical situation in India due to Covid-19. I will continue to work with this team.

section_6.section6_desc1: Life is too short to wear the same boring clothes every day. So why not make the most of fashion to express your true self? Especially when the costs are exceptionally low!
section_6.section6_desc2: That's the backstory of Octics, a Surat-based fashion label with a long heritage in the textile business.
section_6.section6_desc3: They've created their brand online, which is both necessary and inevitable. As a result, they were able to sell well-known brands at affordable pricing all over the world.

section_6.section7_desc1: We needed to draw attention to fashion enthusiasts and meet their wants, which can be a time-consuming task. However, because they spend over 24 hours a week online, the focus was on their behaviour.
section_6.section7_desc2: That means combining the greatest e-commerce design and development principles with a fail-safe marketing plan to give fashionistas a whole new experience.

section_6.section8_desc1: Our main goal was to spruce up the website and mobile app in a way that accurately reflected the brand's potential.
section_6.section8_desc2: To take things to the next level and enable the company to service the entire world, a whole new level of online presence was charted.

section_6.section9_heading: Finding Clarity in Chaos Finding Clarity in Chaos
section_6.section9_desc1: The strategy and tactics were clearly defined from the start to ensure that there was no disconnect or handoff between what we planned and what we did.
section_6.section9_desc2: This required regular meetings for us to gain a thorough understanding of the business and to openly discuss the initiatives to be taken. Our executional expertise were then brought into the collaborative strategic processes.

section_10.section10_desc1: We managed to ensure consistency and effectiveness across each and every initiative we implemented: back-end developers, front-end developers, designers, marketing specialists, SEO specialists, and product managers.

section_11.section11_heading: First things first First things first
section_11.section11_desc1: We needed to draw attention to fashion enthusiasts and meet their wants, which can be a time-consuming task. However, because they spend over 24 hours a week online, the focus was on their behaviour.
section_11.section11_desc2: That means combining the greatest e-commerce design and development principles with a fail-safe marketing plan to give fashionistas a whole new experience.

section_12.section12_desc1: We could focus on the sales funnel now that we knew exactly who the website was speaking to. We've designed a sequence of processes that lead visitors to a purchase decision, from personalised social media campaigns to compelling social media postings.
section_12.section12_desc2: We could focus on the sales funnel now that we knew exactly who the website was speaking to. We've designed a sequence of processes that lead visitors to a purchase decision, from personalised social media campaigns to compelling social media postings.

section_13.section13_desc1: The next step was to structure the website and customer relationship management so that each segment was perfect.

section_14.section14_desc1: Octics' online platform wasn't just designed to be visually appealing but also to provide a seamless buying experience. We designed an environment that balances the demands of users and the needs of the company.
section_14.section14_desc2: This included incorporating a payment gateway that allowed for a smooth checkout process. The admin panel was then customised such that adding products would be simple.
section_14.section14_desc3: Furthermore, in order to provide a seamless user experience, we built a separate mobile website from the ground up.

section_15.section15_desc1: When we applied our solutions, we left no stone untouched. But what if something is missing? That's when we came up with several scenarios for each level of the funnel in order to predict user behaviour and avoid unpleasant situations.
section_15.section15_desc2: For example, we observed that the photos on mobile websites were slowing down the purchasing process, so we moved to a minimalist version to prevent losing conversions.

section_16.section16_desc1: Octics' online platform wasn't just designed to be visually appealing but also to provide a seamless buying experience. We designed an environment that balances the demands of users and the needs of the company.
section_16.section16_desc2: This included incorporating a payment gateway that allowed for a smooth checkout process. The admin panel was then customised such that adding products would be simple.
section_16.section16_desc3: Furthermore, in order to provide a seamless user experience, we built a separate mobile website from the ground up.

section_17.section17_desc1: Digital marketing is simply the most effective technique to boost an online store's brand awareness and revenue. The truth is that it's simple to track, you get rapid feedback, and you can quickly evaluate whether or not a campaign is successful.
section_17.section17_desc2: As a result, reporting an 80 percent increase in traffic after only two months of involvement with this project was simple.

section_18.section18_desc1: Octics has ranked first on Google for some of their top keywords since we began working together. The number of daily sales has risen dramatically, and it has swiftly become a global standard for online buying.

section19_desc1: We're always looking for outstanding clients who are enthusiastic about their products and customers.
